thread.title: Box office: 'Singh is Bliing' mints Rs 54 crore in opening weekend
thread.title_full: Box office: 'Singh is Bliing' mints Rs 54 crore in opening weekend - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Box office: 'Singh is Bliing' mints Rs 54 crore in opening weekend
text:
Bollywood actor Akshay Kumar 's highly anticipated action comedy film 'Singh Is Bliing' is receiving an enormous response at the box office . The Prabhudheva directorial has surpassed the Rs.50 crore mark in just three days since its release on Friday.
*Also read: 'Singh Is Bliing' - Movie Review**Amy Jackson and Akshay Kumar ... Â»
